deepin

deepin is a Debian based GNU/Linux distribution featuring an elegant desktop environment called deepin desktop. As per distrowatch ranking, it is the most popular Chinese GNU/Linux distribution.

Deepin is unique, because of itâ€™s unique desktop environment based on html 5 technologies, known as deepin desktop. Also, deepin provides a lot of great applications like deepin movie player, deepin music player, deepin control center, deepin Software Center ..etc

Status Active
Home Page https://www.deepin.org/en/
